attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 5}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/agile-demon.png} tip={Agile Demon (1st Job)} val={+2}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/focused-fury.png} tip={Focused Fury (3rd Job)} val={+1}>

attackStats.name: STR
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/agile-demon.png} tip={Agile Demon (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/outrage.png} tip={Outrage (2nd Job)} val={+50}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/barricade-mastery.png} tip={Barricade Mastery (4th Job)} val={+50}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/outrage.png} tip={Outrage (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/insult-to-injury.png} tip={Insult to Injury (3rd Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={temp} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-awakening.png} tip={Demon Awakening (5th Job)} val={+65%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis (4th Job)} val={+35%}> <bg type={temp} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demonic-fortitude.png} tip={Demonic Fortitude (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+6% when hit up to +30%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/weapon-mastery.png} tip={Weapon Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/focused-fury.png} tip={Focused Fury (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={temp} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/insult-to-injury.png} tip={Insult to Injury (3rd Job)} val={+15% to enemies with:} val={stun, blind, freeze, paralysis}> × <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+6%}> × <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+11%}>

attackStats.name: Ignore DEF
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/binding-darkness.png} tip={Binding Darkness - Passive (4th Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-cry.png} tip={Demon Cry (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+16%}>

buffInfo.active: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/vengeance.png} tip={Vengeance (2nd Job)} dur={[180s]}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/leech-aura.png} tip={Leech Aura (4th Job)} dur={[180s]}>
buffInfo.summons: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/spirit-of-rage.png} tip={Spirit of Rage (5th Job)} dur={[16s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/orthrus.png} tip={Orthrus (5th Job)} dur={[55s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/defender-of-the-demon.png} tip={Defender of the Demon (5th Job)} dur={[48s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis (4th Job)} dur={[180s](90s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/boundless-rage.png} tip={Boundless Rage (4th Job)} dur={[35s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demonic-fortitude.png} tip={Demonic Fortitude (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-awakening.png} tip={Demon Awakening (5th Job)} dur={[65s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} dur={[140s](180s recharge, up to 2 charges)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} dur={[18s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.binds: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/binding-darkness.png} tip={Binding Darkness (4th Job)} dur={[10s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/nightmare.png} tip={Nightmare (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/raven-storm.png} tip={Raven Storm (3rd Job)} dur={(30s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis (4th Job)} dur={(90s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-bane.png} tip={Demon Bane (5th Job)} dur={[6s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/nightmare.png} tip={Nightmare (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/defender-of-the-demon.png} tip={Defender of the Demon (5th Job)} dur={[6s](-25% | 120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s, triggers once](-75% | 120s cd)}>

info: To create one choose the 'The Demon' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 where you will be given the choice to choose between the 'Demon Avenger' or 'Demon Slayer' classes. You can also choose to skip the cutscenes at the beginning to go straight into choosing between the two classes

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/hp-boost.png} tip={HP Boost}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/shadow-swiftness.png} tip={Shadow Swiftness}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/agile-demon.png} tip={Agile Demon}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/grim-scythe.png} tip={Grim Scythe}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/barbed-lash.png} tip={Barbed Lash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/weapon-mastery.png} tip={Weapon Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/vengeance.png} tip={Vengeance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/outrage.png} tip={Outrage}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/chaos-lock.png} tip={Chaos Lock}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-thrust.png} tip={Dark Thrust}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/soul-eater.png} tip={Soul Eater}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash-arch.png} tip={Demon Lash Arch}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/max-fury.png} tip={Max Fury}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/possessed-aegis.png} tip={Possessed Aegis}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/insult-to-injury.png} tip={Insult to Injury}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/black-hearted-strength.png} tip={Black-Hearted Strength}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/focused-fury.png} tip={Focused Fury}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/raven-storm.png} tip={Raven Storm}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/vortex-of-doom.png} tip={Vortex of Doom}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/judgment.png} tip={Judgment}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/carrion-breath.png} tip={Carrion Breath}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-thrash.png} tip={Demon Thrash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/leech-aura.png} tip={Leech Aura}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/barricade-mastery.png} tip={Barricade Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/infernal-concussion.png} tip={Infernal Concussion}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/obsidian-skin.png} tip={Obsidian Skin}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/binding-darkness.png} tip={Binding Darkness}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-cry.png} tip={Demon Cry}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact.png} tip={Demon Impact}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/boundless-rage.png} tip={Boundless Rage}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash-fury.png} tip={Demon Lash - Fury}> Demon Lash - Fury_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis-enhance.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance}> Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact-reinforce.png} tip={Demon Impact - Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact-extra-strike.png} tip={Demon Impact - Extra Strike}> Demon Impact - Reinforce and Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact.png} tip={Demon Impact (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/cerberus-chomp.png} tip={Cerberus Chomp (Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/infernal-concussion.png} tip={Infernal Concussion (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-cry.png} tip={Demon Cry (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/grim-scythe.png} tip={Grim Scythe (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/soul-eater.png} tip={Soul Eater (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-thrust.png} tip={Dark Thrust (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/chaos-lock.png} tip={Chaos Lock (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/judgment.png} tip={Judgment (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/vortex-of-doom.png} tip={Vortex of Doom (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/raven-storm.png} tip={Raven Storm (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/carrion-breath.png} tip={Carrion Breath (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/infernal-concussion.png} tip={Infernal Concussion (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact.png} tip={Demon Impact (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-cry.png} tip={Demon Cry (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/dark-metamorphosis.png} tip={Dark Metamorphosis (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/binding-darkness.png} tip={Binding Darkness (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/cerberus-chomp.png} tip={Cerberus Chomp (Hyper Skill)}>

extraContent.title: Demon Fury
extraContent.content: Demon Slayers do not use MP and instead use Demon Fury (DF) for their skills. DF will slowly regenerate on its own and whenever you hit an enemy with Demon Lash. Your max DF will increase every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)

primary.name: Dark Winds
primary.shortDesc: High Jump: Press the up arrow key twice during a jump\nJag Jump: Press the right or left arrow key twice during a jump\nGlide: Jump Key (Maintain Press)
details: Right-click the skill to toggle gliding<bp_When on, you can perform a double jump by pressing the Jump Key twice instead_>

primary.name: Demonic Blood
primary.shortDesc: Willpower: Lv. 20, Ambition: Lv. 20, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Curse of Fury
primary.shortDesc: 1% chance to increase damage by 100% when attacking. Recovers 5% HP when triggered. Absorbs Fury if target is eliminated.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: Increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/Love_Lost,_but_not_Forgotten} title={"Love Lost, but not Forgotten"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Demon Lash
primary.shortDesc: 1st, 2nd: Damage: 110%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2.\n3rd: Damage: 100%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3\n4th: Damage: 100%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
details: When the attack hits, you gain some DF

primary.name: Grim Scythe
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 15, Fury Cost: 2, When skill key is held - Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: While held, release a spinning scythe in front of you

primary.name: Agile Demon
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Shadow Swiftness
primary.shortDesc: Speed +25, Jump +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: HP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%

primary.name: Barbed Lash
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +80%p
details: Increases %Damage of the attack by a flat amount

primary.name: Soul Eater
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 45, Fury Cost: 3, When skill key is pressed down - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: While held, create a vortex that pulls enemies in

primary.name: Dark Thrust
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 6, Damage: 115%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Dash forward while pulling enemies along with you

primary.name: Chaos Lock
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 20, After teleporting - Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 3 sec\nAfter teleporting, cannot absorb Fury for 0.7 sec\nCooldown: 0.7 sec
primary.desc: Teleport to a nearby enemy and damages them
details: Attack has a chance to stun
Chaos Lock can also be used as a teleport by pressing the Skill Key along with a Directional Arrow Key<bp_Can be used in the air_>

primary.name: Vengeance
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 150, Returns 400% of damage received back to the enemy for 180 sec, Paralysis Chance: 90%, Paralysis Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: While active, reflect back damage taken
details: Attack has a chance to stun

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Blunt and Axe Mastery: +50%\nFinal Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Outrage
primary.shortDesc: ATT: +50, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Demon Lash Arch
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +30%
details: Increases %Damage of the attack by a flat amount

primary.name: Judgment
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5, Damage: 200%, Critical Hit Rate: +40%
primary.desc: Leap upwards and dive down launching thorns from the ground
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Vortex of Doom
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Create a vortex on both sides that pulls in enemies
details: Attack has a chance to stun

primary.name: Raven Storm
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5, Recovers up to 50% of HP, Invincible while casting\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Send out a flock of ravens forward
details: When the attack hits an enemy, you restore some %Max HP
You are invincible while casting

primary.name: Carrion Breath
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 80, Fury Cost: 6. When skill key is pressed - Damage: 155%, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5. Poison Damage Over Time: 135% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec.
primary.desc: When held, releases a poison breath upon enemies
details: Enemies hit also receive a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Black-Hearted Strength
primary.shortDesc: Increases Defense by +100%, Abnormal Status Resistance by +60, and Elemental Resistance by +60%.

primary.name: Insult to Injury
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage (to stunned, blinded, frozen, slowed, incapacitated enemies): +15%, Permanently increases Critical Rate by 15%

primary.name: Focused Fury
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Possessed Aegis
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, 30% chance of guarding. When guarding is successful, 3% of HP and 5 Fury are recovered.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to guard an incoming attack
details: When guarding is successful, you restore some %Max HP and DF

primary.name: Max Fury
primary.shortDesc: When using Demon Slash, grants a 75% chance of absorbing additional Fury. Automatically recovers 10 Fury every 4 seconds.
primary.desc: Gain an increased chance to restore additional DF while using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}>
details: Additionally, now passively restore DF periodically

primary.name: Demon Thrash
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +30%, Final Damage: +30%
details: Increases %Damage (by a flat amount) and %Final Damage of the attack

primary.name: Infernal Concussion
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 15, Damage: 400%, Max Monsters Hit: 10. Deals 5 critical attacks that deal 320% damage.\nFor first attack, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +400%p
primary.desc: Launch enemies into the air and deal an explosive attack
details: The initial attack deals increased %Damage by a flat amount to regular monsters
Explosion attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Demon Impact
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 8, Damage: 460%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 6, Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%, Slow Duration: 3 sec, Boss Damage: +40%
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF, %Boss Damage, and is a guaranteed Critical Hit while also slowing enemies hit

primary.name: Demon Cry
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 400, Fury Cost: 30, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 515%, Max Monsters Hit: 15\nFor 60 sec, Enemy Attack and Defense: -15%, Accuracy -20%, EXP and Item Drop Rate: +20%.\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Release a large shockwave that damages and debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy has decreased %Attack, %DEF, and %Accuracy. Enemy also will grant increased %EXP and Item Drop Rate when defeated<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Binding Darkness
primary.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 60, Damage: 700%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 3, 100% chance to Stun enemies for 10 sec
Stun Duration increased by up to 100% based on damage inflicted by Binding Darkness.
Cooldown: 120 sec
[Passive Effects] - Permanently increased Ignore Enemy DEF permanently by 30%
primary.desc: Launch an attack that binds enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Dark Metamorphosis
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 40, invincible while casting, Damage: +35% over 180 sec. Automatically attacks nearby enemies dealing 250% damage.\nCooldown: 90 sec\n[Passive Effect: Max HP: +20%]
primary.desc: Create damaging orbs around your character and increases %Damage
details: [Passive]: Increases %Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Boundless Rage
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 100, Use skills without consuming Fury, Duration: 35 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec

primary.name: Leech Aura
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 30, For 180 sec, heals your party members for 3% of the damage you inflict. Cannot recover more than 25% of Max HP. Requires 5 sec cooldown.

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 500, Goddess of Tynerum appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: The Demon's Will
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Barricade Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Blunt and Axe Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Obsidian Skin
primary.shortDesc: Permanently decreases damage taken by 20%

hyperPassive.name: Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When activated, all of Demon Slayer's attacks will negate Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects for 20% of the duration time.\n[Passive Effect: Damage over time will negate Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects.]
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

hyperActive.name: Blue Blood
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 30, Final Damage of all attacks: +90%\n[Passive Effect - Fury consumption on all skills: -20%]
hyperActive.desc: While active, increases the number of hits per attack of all skills
details: [Passive]: Permanently reduces DF consumption on all skills
Does not apply to summoning skills or 5th Job Common Skills
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

hyperActive.name: Cerberus Chomp
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 6, Boss Damage: +50%, Monster Defense Rate Ignored: 50%. Additional Fury Absorption: 50.\nCooldown: 5 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a demon chomp attack in front of you
details: Attack has increased %Boss Damage and %Ignore DEF
Grants DF when used

hyperActive.name: Demonic Fortitude
hyperActive.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Demon Awakening
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 100, Duration: 65 sec, Critical Rate: +65%
Automatically triggers Cerberus every 8 sec when you use an offensive skill, enhances Demon Lash and allows you to use Chaos Lock while Demon Lash is active
Enhanced Demon Lash - hits up to 6 enemies 3 times, Monster DEF Ignored: +50%, Boss Damage: +50%, 1st/2nd Hit Damage: 600%, 3rd Hit Damage: 700%, 4th Hit Damage: 800%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> and gain increased %Crit Rate
details: While active, you can also activate <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/chaos-lock.png} tip={Chaos Lock (2nd Job)}> while using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/cerberus-chomp.png} tip={Cerberus Chomp (Hyper Skill)}> will periodically activate whenever you use an attack<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>
Enhanced <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> has increased %Ignore DEF and %Boss Damage

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Rage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 60, HP Cost: 2000
Duration: 16 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2145%, Number of Attacks: 12
[On Disappearance] Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2310%, Number of Attacks: 15
All hits receive Critical Rate: +100% and additional Ignore Def: +50%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a spirit that attacks nearby enemies
details: Deals a final attack once the summon expires
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and guaranteed Critical Hits
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Orthrus
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 30 Fury
Summon Duration: 55 sec.
Nemea: Attacks every 2 sec, Damage: 880%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Hits: 12, Additional Fury Absorption: 8
Geryon: Attacks every 3 sec, Damage: 1980%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Hits: 10, Additional Fury Absorption: 12
All Orthrus hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon two spirits that attack alongside you
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and guaranteed Critical Hits
Attack also grants additional Fury upon successful hit
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Demon Bane
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 60, HP Cost: 2000, Invincibility Duration: 6 sec.
When used while Demon Awakening is active, Demon Bane Final Damage: +90%
Attacks up to 5 enemies with 580% damage 6 times during key-down. Max Key-Down Time: 3 sec
When you stop holding the key, consecutively attack 12 enemies with 1375% damage 7 time(s), increases attack time by 2x in proportion to key-down duration.
Additional Critical Rate: +50%, Additional DEF Ignored: +30% for all attacks
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Release a storm of blades that strike from below
details: Upon casting, you are invincible for a few seconds
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and %Crit Rate

Unleashes a final attack after the Skill Key is released<bp_The duration of the attack increases based on how long the Skill Key was held_To cancel the attack early, press the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together_>
While <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-awakening.png} tip={Demon Awakening (5th Job)}> is active, Demon Bane deals increased %Final Damage

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-impact.png} tip={Demon Impact (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Demon Impact
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 690%, Number of Attacks: 6
Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: +40%
Boss Damage: +45%, Slow Duration: 3 sec
HEXA Demon Impact: Demon Chain Enhancement: every 15 sec
------HEXA Demon Impact: Demon Chain------
Fury Cost: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 6
When attack hits, recovers 50 Fury
Duration: 60 sec, Enemy Defense: -15%, Enemy Attack Power and Accuracy: -20%
The Demon Chain debuff does not stack with the Demon Cry debuff, and the debuff with the higher value is applied.
Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: +40%
Boss Damage: +45%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/demon-lash.png} tip={Demon Lash (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/demon-slayer/infernal-concussion.png} tip={Infernal Concussion (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Demon Lash
masteryCore.shortDesc:
1st, 2nd: Damage: 340%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2.
3rd: Damage: 325%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
4th: Damage: 325%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
Demonic Spear - Damage: 500%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 6, Cooldown: 6 sec
Demon Awakening Demonic Spear Damage: 800%, Cooldown: 3 sec
Demonic Spear Normal Enemy Damage: +180%p
[Passive Effect: Demon Awakening's Enhanced Demon Lash Damage: +80%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Infernal Concussion
masteryCore.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 585%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCritical Rate: +60%, Normal Enemy Damage: +205%p\n[Passive Effect: Demon Impact Damage: +70%p, Demon Chain Damage: +90%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Nightmare
originSkill.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 50, Invincible during casting
Release Fury, Shockwave Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 3000%, Number of Attacks: 4, Shockwaves: 6, then manifest the Demon's territory.
Demon's Territory - Duration: 20 sec, max Fury limit can exceed up to 500 times. Using direct attack skills activates the Flames of the Netherworld, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 2229%, Number of Attacks: 7, Cooldown: 0.3 sec
When using the flames of the nether world activate, Bonus Fury Recovery: 10
Using the skill again ends it immediately, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1760%, Number of Attacks: 7, Netherworld Judgment Activations: 46
For each 10 Fury gained by exceeding the max Fury limit, Netherworld Judgment Final Damage: +1%, invincible and ignore status effects during casting of Netherworld Judgment
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Demon Slayer is a STR warrior class part of the Demons & Resistance class group. Demon Slayers do not use MP and instead use Demon Fury (DF) for their skills. You will gain more DF every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)
